title: Google Project Dragonfly Resistance: 1,400 Employees Kill China Censorship Engine (2018-2019)
description: Investigate the successful employee resistance that killed Project Dragonfly, Google's censored search engine for China, through sustained internal resistance including resignations, petitions, and strategic media leaks.
research_areas: How was Project Dragonfly discovered and exposed by Google employees?
What specific tactics did the 1,400 employees use to resist the project?
Which employees resigned in protest and what impact did this have?
How did congressional hearings amplify employee resistance?
What long-term policy changes resulted from the employee victory?
source_requirements: Employee resignation letters, internal project documents, congressional testimony, media leaks, Chinese government communications
pdf_source: Technology Worker Resistance and Constitutional Cryptography_ Tools for Democratic Resilience.pdf
